Write an email
I walk to the Home Office then find the computer and sit in the chair. I switch on the computer and start typing the email. I switch the computer off.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <chair> (1.356)
[SIT] <chair> (1.356)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.417)
[TURNTO] <computer> (1.417)
[LOOKAT] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.415)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.415)
[SWITCHOFF] <computer> (1.417)
